modName: Severin Manor is Your Own Home
summary: Refine almost all area of Severin Manor. Add Many equipments
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Severin Manor is my own home indeed.[/size][/font]
[/b][size=3]I truly love this convenient and functional place. I've struggled to make here more comfortable.[/size] [size=3]Now almost all area have been refined and many equipments are available![/size]

[size=4][u][color=#ffd966]Changed log
[/color][/u][/size][color=#fff2cc][size=3][b]Ver 3.0: Forges are enhanced
[/b][/size][/color][list]
[*][color=#fff2cc][size=2][b]The ability of Skyforge & Fort Dawnguard are added to the blacksmith forge.[/b][/size][/color]
[*][color=#fff2cc][size=2][b]Add Atronach Forge function to the Arcane enchanter.[/b][/size][/color]
[*][color=#fff2cc][size=2][b]Set Aetherium Forge in front of the smeltar.[/b][/size][/color]
[*][color=#fff2cc][size=2][b]Some ambient decorations has been added.[/b][/size][/color]
[/list][size=2]Ver 2.1: Do some adjustments.[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Fixed some misplaced objects.[/size]
[*][size=2]Adjusted the bed to gain "well rest bonus". (But for some reason, message may not appear on top-left. Miraak's curse?)[/size]
[*][size=2]Added milk spawners in the farm.[/size]
[*][size=2]Added Bloodstone Chalice in the coffin room.[/size]
[/list][size=2]Ver 2.0: Add Upstairs Farm area & Underground Grotto.
ver 1.01: Fixed invalid file header.[u]
[/u]ver 1.0: Merged [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73026]"Severin Manor Kitchen"[/url] , [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74167/]"Severin Manor Bathroom"[/url],and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87481]"Severin Manor Crafting Room"[/url].
ver 0.5: First release. only include center room.[/size]

[size=4][u][b][color=#a4c2f4]Features
[/color][/b][/u][/size]Basic[list]
[*][size=2]Improve Dungeon like BGM[/size]
[*][size=2]Add lightings to whole area[/size]
[/list]﻿
[size=3]Upper floor[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Changed to Kitchen[/size]
[*][size=2]Oven and recipe of "Boiled cream treat" [/size]
[*][size=2]Brewing barrel which can make drinks[/size]
[*][size=2]Butter churn[/size]
[*][size=2]Wood chopping block[/size]
[/list]
[size=3]North area[/size][size=3]
[/size][list]
[*][size=2]Staff enchanter[/size]
[*][size=2]Replace the combat dummies to trophy booth[/size]
[*][size=2]Clean up and decorate the forge area[/size]
[*][size=2]Blacksmith forge ; Can make Skyforge arms, Enhanced crossbows, and Exploding bolts.[/size]
[*][size=2]Atronach Forge ; Same as Winterhold's one. Sigil Stone is also available, needs to be brought from college.[/size]
[*][size=2]Aetherium Forge ; Almost just a monument but may useful for some dwarven MOD.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
South area[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2] Change the guest room to bathroom [/size]
[*][size=2] Add an equitable item "Clothes Basket" (can undress quickly by this. Also can make this at tanning rack)[/size]
[*][size=2] Greenhouse; 32 fertile soils are available[/size]
[/list]
[size=3]Center path[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Shrines of Nine Divines and Auriel[/size]
[/list]
[size=3]Center room[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Decorate all over the center living room[/size]
[*][size=2]2 beds[/size]
[*][size=2]Shrines of Azura, Boethiah, Mephala[/size]
[*][size=2]Shrine of Nocturnal beside the main bed[/size]
[*]Coffin room for vampires in the additional basement
[*][size=2]Bloodstone Chalice in the coffin room[/size]
[/list]
[size=3]Farm area (additional upstairs)[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Grain mill[/size]
[*][size=2]2 Apiarys which spawn honey (Vanilla doesn't)[/size]
[*][size=2]2 Cow[/size]
[*][size=2]4 Milk spawners ; Can take 2 Jug of Milk from each of them. 10 days respawn[/size]
[*][size=2]4 Chicken with nests[/size]
[/list]
[size=3]Grotto (additional underground)[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Deposit of Rock Salt. Rock salt is can be changed into 5 salt piles with cooking pot.[/size]
[*][size=2]Fish hatchery with small pond[/size]
[/list]
[color=#c9daf8][size=4][u][b]Recommended Mod[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62028/?]Dwemer Stone Bench Fix[/url] by Kanaru: Improve bath room's sitting points.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64044]Daily Eggs --- Busy Bees[/url] by Ceruulean: Accelerate chicken egg spawn cycle.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25239]Berts Hearthfire Dairy Goods Upgrade[/url] by berticus: Can get milk from cow.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69112]Highland Cow Retex[/url] by Pufscher: Makes cow so cute.[/size]
[/list]
[size=4][color=#93c47d][u][b]Required[/b][/u][/color][/size]
[size=3]  DLC Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn[/size]

[color=#b4a7d6][size=4][u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u][/size][/color][list]
[*][size=2]Works with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47751/]"Severin Manor -Garden in Basement"[/url] by Jokerine and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31167/]"Severin Manor Improvements"[/url] (Lite & No-Manequins ver.) by uglydamon[/size]
[*][size=2][b][u]NOT[/u][/b] compatible with my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73026]"Severin Manor Kitchen"[/url] , [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74167/]"Severin Manor Bathroom"[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87481]"Severin Manor Crafting Room"[/url] (These are already merged into this mod)[/size]
[/list][color=#ead1dc][u][b][size=4]
Installation[/size][/b][/u][/color]
[size=2]This mod changes many position of objects defined in Dragonborn. To apply it correctly, recommend to stay far from manor as possible when installing.(By resetting cell, objects will be correctly set.)[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ea9999][size=4]With great appreciate to all lovers and modders of Severin Manor :)[/size][/color][/font]
author: Pumpkin Pie
